mcq.statement: Which of the following was NOT an objective of the All-India Muslim League at its formation?

options.a: To create loyalty towards the British government
options.b: To safeguard the political rights of Muslims
options.c: To bring Muslims' rights to the notice of the government
options.d: To promote hostility against other communities

mcq.one_liner: Promoting hostility among Muslims against other communities was **not** an objective of the All-India Muslim League at its formation.
